Specimen Type: Whole blood, plasma, urine, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), other body fluids
Purpose: To detect Cytomegalovirus DNA in clinical specimens for the diagnosis and monitoring of CMV infections.
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood; sterile, appropriately labeled containers for plasma, urine, CSF, and other body fluids
Equipment: Biosafety cabinet, centrifuge, micropipettes with sterile filter tips, vortex mixer, thermal cycler, real-time PCR instrument
